name: Mike's Lab
description:
Description
Mike's Lab is a multi ending puzzle platformer.  As of now, there's only "3" endings.
I ran out of time :P
Controls
W/Up = Jump
A/D/Left/Right = Move
Camera Controls
(If you feels like something is impossible to see, try centering the camera)
(Some parts are intended to not be seen)
Q to toggle camera centering
Shift to temporarily invert toggled camera state
The rest of the controls will be explained in game.

*This game contains minor swearing that's censored and is literally only 2 words for entertaining purposes.
Regarding Bugs
... because I know there will be a lot of them
To report a bug, simply put them in the comments or message me via disocrd Cocoon#5487.
- If you somehow soft-locked yourself, please report to me with a screenshot, and kindly restart your game in such event.
